hero.title: Digital Empowerment in India
hero.description: MotionQ helps Indian users control their computers using just eye movements, facial expressions, and blinks—without any external hardware.

features.title: How MotionQ Works
features.description: Advanced AI and computer vision technology transforms your facial movements into seamless computer control.
features.eyeTrackingDesc: Real-time gaze tracking converts your eye movements into precise cursor control.
features.blinkDetectionDesc: Intentional blinks are recognized and used as click commands—no hands needed.
features.facialExpressionsDesc: Smiles, eyebrow raises, and expressions trigger custom actions like scrolling.
features.noHardwareDesc: Works with any standard webcam—no expensive external hardware required.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Digital Freedom?
cta.description: Join thousands of Indian users who have taken control of their digital lives with MotionQ.

hero.title: The Digital Divide
hero.description: Millions of people globally live with motor impairments that make traditional input devices like a mouse or keyboard difficult to use, creating barriers to digital independence.

hero.title: Meet
hero.description: A smart, webcam-based interface that transforms facial movements into seamless computer control using advanced AI and computer vision technology.

howItWorks.title: How MotionQ Works
howItWorks.description: Our system uses advanced algorithms to detect and interpret your facial movements in real-time
howItWorks.step1Desc: Real-time face landmark detection maps key points on your face and eyes
howItWorks.step2Desc: Eye movement is translated into cursor control for precise pointer movement
howItWorks.step3Desc: Intentional blinks are detected and used as click commands
howItWorks.step4Desc: Facial expressions trigger custom actions like scrolling and right-click
howItWorks.step5Desc: All movements are processed locally for instant, private computer control

tech.title: Powered by Advanced Technology
tech.description: MotionQ leverages cutting-edge libraries and frameworks for reliable performance
tech.mediapipe: Google's machine learning framework provides robust face and hand landmark detection with high accuracy and real-time performance.
tech.opencv: Computer vision library handles image processing, camera input, and advanced algorithms for gesture recognition and tracking.
tech.pyautogui: Cross-platform automation library translates detected movements into actual mouse and keyboard actions on your system.

features.title: What Makes MotionQ Different
features.accessibility1: Created specifically for users with limited mobility
features.accessibility2: Intuitive interface with minimal learning curve
features.privacy1: All processing happens locally on your device
features.privacy2: No data sent to external servers
features.privacy3: Complete control over your personal information

ctaSolution.title: Ready to Experience MotionQ?
ctaSolution.description: See how our technology can transform your digital experience with just your webcam and facial movements.

stats.adults: Adults in India with a disability

impact.title: Real-World Impact
impact.description: Understanding the daily challenges faced by individuals with limited motor function
impact.basic1: Browsing the web and accessing information

current.title: Current Solutions Fall Short
current.expensiveDesc: Eye-tracking devices cost thousands of dollars, making them inaccessible to many
current.complexDesc: Existing solutions require extensive calibration and technical expertise
current.poorDesc: Webcam-based tools are often inaccurate and frustrating for daily use

cta.title: It's Time for a Better Solution
cta.description: MotionQ addresses these challenges with an affordable, accurate, and easy-to-use solution that works with any standard webcam.

hero.title: See MotionQ
hero.description: Watch how MotionQ transforms facial movements into seamless computer control in real-time.

video.title: Software Download Demo
video.subtitle: Step-by-step installation guide
video.description: Demo shows the complete download process, installation steps, and initial setup of MotionQ software.

howToUse.title: How to Use MotionQ
howToUse.description: Follow these simple steps to start controlling your computer with facial movements
howToUse.step1Desc: Position your webcam at eye level and ensure good lighting for optimal face detection.
howToUse.step2Desc: Look at different points on screen to calibrate eye tracking for accurate cursor movement.
howToUse.step3Desc: Learn the basic gestures: blink to click, smile for right-click, eyebrow raise to scroll.
howToUse.step4Desc: Begin using MotionQ to browse, click, and interact with your computer naturally.

highlights.title: Demo Highlights
highlights.description: Key features demonstrated in our real-time showcase
highlights.cursorDesc: Watch as eye movements translate to smooth cursor control across the screen with real-time tracking visualization.
highlights.blinkDesc: See how intentional blinks are accurately detected and converted to left-click actions with visual feedback.
highlights.gesturesDesc: Experience how smiles trigger right-clicks and eyebrow movements control scrolling and other custom actions.
highlights.responseDesc: Observe the instant response time and accuracy of gesture recognition with on-screen debugging overlays.

interactive.title: Try MotionQ in Your Browser
interactive.description: Experience real TensorFlow.js-powered face tracking with live webcam processing
interactive.demoDescription: Click to enable camera and experience real-time face tracking with TensorFlow.js
interactive.realTimeDescription: Real-time TensorFlow.js BlazeFace integration with face detection from your webcam feed. This demo processes your live video to detect facial landmarks and simulate eye tracking movements.
interactive.calibrationLook: Look at the red dot and press SPACE

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Download MotionQ and experience the full power of hands-free computer control.

hero.title: Download
hero.description: Get started with MotionQ in minutes. Easy installation, comprehensive setup guide, and full support documentation.

requirements.title: System Requirements
requirements.description: Ensure your system meets these requirements for optimal performance
requirements.minProcessor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 or equivalent
requirements.recProcessor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or better
requirements.minCamera: Any USB webcam or built-in camera (720p+)

installation.title: Installation Guide
installation.description: Step-by-step instructions to get MotionQ running on your system

windows.step1Desc: Click the "Download for Windows" button above to get the MotionQ installer (.exe file).
windows.step2Desc: Double-click the downloaded file and follow the installation wizard. Administrator privileges may be required.
windows.step3Desc: The installer will automatically download and install Python, OpenCV, MediaPipe, and other required libraries.
windows.step4Desc: Find MotionQ in your Start Menu or desktop shortcut and launch the application.

macos.step1Desc: Download the MotionQ .dmg file for macOS from the download section above.
macos.step2Desc: Double-click the .dmg file, then drag MotionQ to your Applications folder.
macos.step3Desc: Allow camera access and accessibility permissions when prompted by macOS.
macos.step4Desc: Open MotionQ from your Applications folder or Launchpad.

linux.step1Desc: Download the .deb package for Ubuntu/Debian or .rpm for Red Hat-based distributions.
linux.step3Desc: Run: sudo apt install -f to resolve any missing dependencies.
linux.step4Desc: Find MotionQ in your applications menu or run motionq from terminal.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.description: Common issues and solutions to get MotionQ working smoothly
troubleshooting.cameraDescription: If MotionQ can't access your camera:
troubleshooting.cameraTip1: Check camera permissions in system settings
troubleshooting.cameraTip2: Ensure no other apps are using the camera
troubleshooting.cameraTip3: Try unplugging and reconnecting USB cameras
troubleshooting.cpuDescription: If MotionQ is using too much CPU:

help.title: Need More Help?
help.description: Can't find a solution? Our community and documentation have more detailed troubleshooting guides.

hero.title: Meet the
hero.description: We're a passionate group of developers, designers, and accessibility advocates working to make technology inclusive for everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: MotionQ is more than just a project—it's a step toward inclusive design and tech accessibility for everyone. We believe that technology should adapt to people, not the other way around. Our goal is accessibility without compromise.

members.title: Core Team
members.description: The dedicated individuals behind MotionQ's development and vision
members.member1Desc: Computer vision specialist with 5+ years in accessibility tech. Leads the core algorithm development.
members.member2Desc: Accessibility-focused designer ensuring MotionQ is intuitive and user-friendly for all abilities.
members.member3Desc: Machine learning expert optimizing gesture recognition and improving accuracy through advanced algorithms.
members.member4Desc: Coordinates development efforts and ensures MotionQ meets real user needs through extensive testing.
members.member5Desc: Full-stack developer handling cross-platform compatibility and system integration features.
members.member6Desc: Disability rights advocate ensuring MotionQ meets the highest accessibility standards and user needs.

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: Help us improve MotionQ and make technology more accessible for everyone
community.contributeDesc: Help improve MotionQ by contributing to our open-source codebase on GitHub.
community.feedbackDesc: Your experience and suggestions help us make MotionQ better for everyone.
community.ideasDesc: Have ideas for new features or improvements? We'd love to hear from you.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have feedback, questions, or want to get involved? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your experience, suggestions, or how you'd like to contribute...
contact.emailText: You can also reach us directly at

hero.title: User Testing
hero.description: Real user feedback and performance metrics demonstrate MotionQ's effectiveness in providing accessible computer control.

analysis.title: Performance Analysis
analysis.description: Comprehensive testing across different user groups and use cases

feedback.title: User Feedback
feedback.description: What our test participants said about their MotionQ experience
feedback.testimonial1: MotionQ has completely changed how I interact with my computer. The setup was surprisingly easy and it works better than I expected.
feedback.testimonial2: The accuracy is impressive. I can browse the web, send emails, and even play simple games. It's given me back my digital independence.
feedback.testimonial3: Great concept and execution. Sometimes the eye tracking needs recalibration, but overall it's a fantastic tool that I use daily.

study.title: Study Methodology
study.description: How we conducted our user testing and validation

improvements.title: Key Improvements Made
improvements.improvement1Desc: Improved algorithm sensitivity based on user feedback to reduce accidental clicks by 60%.
improvements.improvement2Desc: Smoothed cursor movement and added customizable sensitivity settings for better precision.
improvements.improvement3Desc: Streamlined the calibration process and added automatic recalibration when accuracy drops.
improvements.improvement4Desc: Enhanced performance in various lighting conditions through improved image processing.

cta.title: Experience the Results Yourself
cta.description: Join the growing community of users who have improved their digital accessibility with MotionQ.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.description: Sign in to your MotionQ account to access your personalized settings
login.demoDescription: Try MotionQ instantly with our demo account

register.title: Create Account
register.description: Join MotionQ to personalize your accessibility experience
register.newsletter: Send me updates about MotionQ features and accessibility news

hero.title: Privacy &
hero.description: MotionQ is built with privacy-first principles and comprehensive accessibility standards to ensure a safe, inclusive experience for all users.

priority.title: Your Privacy is Our Priority
priority.description: MotionQ operates with complete transparency about data handling and user privacy
priority.localDesc: All facial recognition and gesture processing happens entirely on your local device. Your camera feed never leaves your computer.
priority.local1: No video data transmitted to servers
priority.zeroDesc: MotionQ doesn't collect, store, or transmit any personal data, biometric information, or usage analytics.
priority.zero1: No user accounts or registration required
priority.transparentDesc: Our open-source codebase allows anyone to verify our privacy claims and security practices.
priority.transparent1: Full source code available on GitHub
priority.cloudDesc: MotionQ works completely offline without requiring internet connectivity or cloud services.
priority.cloud1: No external API calls during operation

standards.title: Accessibility Standards
standards.description: MotionQ is designed to meet and exceed international accessibility guidelines
standards.wcagDesc: Compliant with Web Content Accessibility Guidelines for maximum compatibility
standards.section508Desc: Meets US federal accessibility requirements for government and public use
standards.adaDesc: Designed to meet Americans with Disabilities Act requirements
standards.universal1: Equitable use for people with diverse abilities
standards.inclusive1: Adjustable sensitivity for different motor abilities
standards.inclusive2: Multiple input methods and gesture options

security.title: Security & Permissions
security.description: Understanding what permissions MotionQ needs and how we protect your security
security.cameraDesc: Required for facial recognition and gesture detection
security.systemDesc: Needed to move cursor and simulate mouse clicks
security.personalDesc: No access to files, contacts, or personal data
security.dataProtection1: No persistent storage of biometric data

contact.title: Questions About Privacy or Accessibility?
contact.description: We're committed to transparency and continuous improvement. Reach out with any concerns or suggestions.
